summary: This patch simply makes Tania the Hermit follower mod and the last version of Requiem more compatible.
descriptionHtml:
[size=2][size=3][size=4]This is a simple patch to make [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58670/?]Tania the Hermit[/url] (by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5742279/?]Kasprutz[/url]) follower mods to fit better with Requiem 1.8.1(.1).

The changes I have made, both improve requiem's compatibility and requiem's lore.[/size]

[u][size=4]Changelog :
[/size][/u]
Version 1.2 :

[size=2]Added few news records brought with 3.5 to my patch and updated some old records that were updated by the version 3.5 of the mod.[/size]

The version 1.1 :

[size=2][size=3][u]Changes on Tania : [/u][/size][/size]
[size=2]
I've edited the Hermit race, to match other races in requiem, I think the hermit race was based on woodelf so I've added most requiem's woodelf characteristics. But not all it has to be unique.
Most noticeably her carry weight goes from a base of 300 to 85.
I've also edited the vampire version of Hermit Race, to fits requiem vampire race, as a vampire her carryweigh is now of 145 (instead of 300).
I've also increased a little her base health/magicka/stamina since it suits better with her race new characteristics. But nothing overpowered, not at all![/size]

The version 1.0 contains :

[u]Changes on Tania : [/u][/size]

Her creator says : "She is weak and fragile so, you need to take care of her in combat."[/size][size=2]
I took it into account and in my opinion, she needed to have some of her skills lowered to fit better with requiem's mechanics. But I did not lowered them too much though.
I've also added her two requiem's required perks.
She no longer have infinite arrows, she has only 40 arrows and it will decrease accordingly to her fight and non recovered arrows.
[/size][size=2]
[u][size=3]Changes on her gear :[/size][/u]

Dagger :
In order to requiemify h[/size][size=2]er dagger, I had to lower its base damage. It was even more deadly than Daedric/dragonbone daggers.
(but remenber, requiem add it's own multiplier damage so it's still increadly deadlier than vanilla.) Now it has the same base damage than Glass daggers.
Its critical damage was also lowered a little bit but on the other hand I have lowered the weight of the dagger.
But it is still a very powerful dagger! And considering its very high base damage and it is a unique dagger, its price was considerably raised, its new value is now set to 825 septims. (275 default).

[/size][size=2]Bow :
The bow is now much more powerful, like requiem's bow, it's a light bow though I gave it similar stats than elven bow, but slightly less. It now has a base damage of 25 (default was 7 and elven bow is 26). Its weight felt just about right.
However it has a main advantage over the standard elven bow, it is efficient against undeads since it is made of silver.
Just like other requiem's bow its animation speed was lowered by 2.5 times but it's still a fast bow among according to requiem.
Bow value was again considerably increase, it is now worth 940 septims (I think a princess uses expensive tools ? And many items in Requiem are much more expensive) because it is rare and powerful at the same time.
I've also added a requiem keyword to the bow.

Arrows:
Added missing requiem's keyword
They are now nearly 4 times more powerfull, nearly like the elven arrow, just slightly less since they are more effective agaisnt undead.
Their values was raised to 20 septim instead of 5.


[u][size=4]Load order : [/size][/u]

...
...
Hermit.esp
...
...
...
Requiem.esp    <------------------------------------- Requiem.esp should be quite low in your load order, do not trust LOOT or BOSS.
[/size]...                                                                    If you put something after requiem.esp it is because you know what you do.
Requiem 1.8 - Tania the Hermit 3.0.1.esp
...

If you don't know what can go after and what has to be before requiem you can check my load order :
[url=http://pastebin.com/v2quGUKY]http://pastebin.com/v2quGUKY[/url]

[size=3]Thanks and Credits
Kasprutz, Magnificat and Aryes Grace for Tania the Hermit
